titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Aaron Heller Collection MC.256
titlestmt.author: Jennifer E. Neal

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-12-14 08:44:52 -0500.

did.abstract: This collection documents the graduation and career of David Aaron, or Aaron David, Heller. Materials include a diploma and various certificates.
did.physdesc: The diploma appears to be parchment and is framed and mounted to matboard. It is unclear whether the diploma can be unframed safely. Many of the certificates are fragile.
did.physloc: Materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use. Please request materials at least two business days prior to your research visit to coordinate access.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the Aaron Heller Collection is restricted until it has been arranged and described by an archivist.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Materials were donated by Joseph Heller in circa 2015. The accession number related to this collection is 15.019.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Aaron Heller Collection; MC 256; box number; folder number or item identifier; New York University Archives, New York University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Materials include a diploma and various certificates documenting the graduation and career of Aaron David (or David Aaron) Heller. Heller's name is written Aaron David and David Aaron on various documents.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection is protected by copyright and/or related rights. You are free to use materials in the collection in any way that is permitted by the copyright and related rights legislation that applies to your use. For other uses you need to obtain permission from the rights-holder(s).
